subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Magglio Ordóñez had his 20th two-homer game last night as the host Detroit Tigers defeated the Los Angeles Angels, 8-7, and snapped their six-game winning streak.
snippet: Magglio Ordóñez had his 20th two-homer game last night as the host Detroit Tigers defeated the Los Angeles Angels, 8-7, and snapped their six-game winning streak.
